title: Initializing Rollup Node error: OP Goerli node failed to load p2p config
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
The issue is described as follows, adding '--p2p.disable' can avoid this error, but it will also disable P2P synchronization

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
t=2023-10-08T14:53:22+0000 lvl=info msg="Initializing Rollup Node"
ERROR[10-08|14:53:22.529] Unable to create the rollup node config  error="failed to load p2p config: failed to load p2p discovery options: failed to open discovery db: resource temporarily unavailable"
CRIT [10-08|14:53:22.529] Application failed                       message="failed to load p2p config: failed to load p2p discovery options: failed to open discovery db: resource temporarily unavailable"

**System Specs:**
 - OS: ubuntu 22,04
 - Package Version (or commit hash):
commit b3c77b0aba751401a3b2e7415454caa5a06afeb2 (HEAD -> develop, origin/develop, origin/HEAD)
Merge: 80fdee6cf ea12a7aeb
Author: OptimismBot <112345690+OptimismBot@users.noreply.github.com>
Date:   Fri Sep 15 08:08:00 2023 -0400

**Additional context**
cd ~/optimism/op-node

./bin/op-node \
        --l2=ws://localhost:8551 \
        --l2.jwt-secret=./jwt.txt \
        --rpc.addr=0.0.0.0 \
        --rpc.port=8847 \
        --l1=https://ethereum-goerli.publicnode.com \
        --l1.rpckind=basic \
        --network=goerli
